channel.title: Overthrowing the Joos, the 5-point plan
channel.description:
this is my essay entitled overthrowin the joos the 5 point plan
[font=courier][size=24pt][b]1. israel is not theirs[/b][/size][/font] [size=24pt]they stole israel from the plaestintian peoples, who are descendents of the ancient greeks.[/size].. we cant allow the constructors of modern western society to be slain and ruled over by joos. [size=36pt][u][b]joos are not greek[/b][/u][/size], joos are joos. joos are not allowed a country (source: the bible, genesis 6:9)...
[size=14pt][font=trebuchet ms]2. joos live near me[/font][/size] srsly theres a joo encampment near me and i see their kind everyday, i analyze their movements, especially the fat joos. fat joos are our way in to their society, we will destroy them from inside out. [size=18pt]they thought they joo gold was hidden properly...[/size] they were wrong. they are joos and [size=14pt][font=times new roman]joos must lose all of their gold reserves so [size=36pt]we[/size] can establish the publicly owned government bank of the us of a[/font][/size]... joos look at them..
[font=verdana][size=36pt]3. joos control the us of a[/size][/font] the joos since joo rothschild have controlled the us of a money system... we cant let them set prices on joo gold, or their gold will suddenly be worth 10000x before. it will overflow the integer, which will mean our banking sistems will need to be 64bits. [font=comic sans ms][font=arial][b]this is a massive problem in modern day computationing.[/b][/font][/font]
[size=18pt][font=arial black]4. joos are controlled by davidi2[/font][/size] davidi2 seems like a nice church boy but theres an evil truth behind all of this... davidi2 is the david from the star of david. this means hes a joo and as such must be dealth with extemely quickly... [size=14pt][font=georgia]the star has 6 sites, davidi has 6 letters. not a coincidence~~~[/font][/size] if u also flip the i in davidi you get david!... it proves his importence to the jooish [spoiler]terrorists[/spoiler]
[size=36pt][font=comic sans ms]~~~~ 5. svitkona my brother has an important infograpic for u all to look at~~~ CODE RED DONT CLICK BELOW[/font][/size] this is proof israel is belong to joos and we must take car of them [spoiler=CODE RED DONT OPEN IF UR A JEW][img]http://i.imgur.com/JQduk62.jpg[/img][/spoiler]
[hr] [size=24pt][font=andale mono][i]edit1[/i][/font][/size]
ok i had some jooish and muslim sources talk to me in pm, we had a [size=24pt]lengthly conversashion [/size]and eventully agreed that joos were infact[size=18pt][u][u][font=courier] yazidis [/font][/u][/u][/size]which ment they are devil worshippers in the [font=courier]holy religion of islam[/font]
[size=24pt][font=andale mono] this is not ok. NOT OK[/font][/size]
~~~'''...&/// pls keep emalin mue ur cocerns and i wil rbing them up wiht my superiors \\\&...'''~~~ thank u
[hr] [size=24pt][font=impact]thx, like, rate, subscribe for more daily content from pure[/font][/size]
